name: Postman
shortDescription: Use our Postman collection to get started with the Quix APIs
longDescription:
Use our Postman collection to get started with the Quix APIs

  • Click `Copy code` to copy the Postman JSON to your clipboard.
  • Paste the JSON into a new file
  • Save it
  • Import it into Postman.
  • Create a topic called `postman` in the Quix Portal
  • Enable persistence on the `postman` topic
